name: Edward Witten
doctoral_students: Cumrun Vafa   Xiao-Gang Wen   Eva Silverstein   Shamit Kachru   Sergei Gukov , Dror Bar-Natan
known_for: String Theory   Superstring Theory, M-Theory  Quantum Gravity  Quantum Field Theory Topological Quantum Field Theory, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Noncommutative_quantum_field_theory Non-Commutative Quantum Field Theories, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Low-dimensional_topology Low-dimensional Topology, Supersymmetry Morse Theory, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chern%E2%80%93Simons_theory Chern-Simons Theory, Knot Theory, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jones_polynomial Generalizing the Jones Polynomial, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hodge_theory Relating Hodge-de Rham Theory to Supersymmetric QFT, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Witten_conjecture Witten Conjecture, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Positive_energy_theorem New proof of the Positive Energy Theorem, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mostow_rigidity_theorem Rigidity Theorems, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AdS/CFT_correspondence Work on the Gauge-Gravity Duality, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seiberg%E2%80%93Witten_invariant Seiberg-Witten Invariants
work_institution: Institute for Advanced Study, Harvard University, California Institute of Technology, Princeton University
